member.name: T:Ivi.LxiSync.Errors

member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The alarm time is invalid..

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The reserved repeated capability cannot be removed from the collection..

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The event source has not been specified..

member.name: P:Ivi.LxiSync.Errors.InvalidEventSource

member.name: P:Ivi.LxiSync.Errors.WiredOrModeInvalid

member.name: T:Ivi.LxiSync.ArmSourceDetection
member.summary: Defined values for the style of arm source detection.

member.name: F:Ivi.LxiSync.ArmSourceDetection.Rise
member.summary: The LXI device will arm on the rising edge of the arm source.

member.name: F:Ivi.LxiSync.ArmSourceDetection.Fall
member.summary: The LXI device will arm on the falling edge of the arm source.

member.name: F:Ivi.LxiSync.ArmSourceDetection.High
member.summary: The LXI device will arm while the arm source is high, that is, while it remains true.

member.name: F:Ivi.LxiSync.ArmSourceDetection.Low
member.summary: The LXI device will arm while the arm source is low, that is, while it remains false.

member.summary: Reference to the ILxiSyncArm interface.

member.summary: Reference to the ILxiSyncEventLog interface.

member.name: P:Ivi.LxiSync.IIviLxiSync.Events
member.summary: Reference to the ILxiSyncEvents interface.

member.name: P:Ivi.LxiSync.IIviLxiSync.Time
member.summary: Reference to the ILxiSyncTime interface.

member.name: P:Ivi.LxiSync.IIviLxiSync.Trigger
member.summary: Reference to the ILxiSyncTrigger interface.

member.name: T:Ivi.LxiSync.IIviLxiSyncArm
member.summary: LxiSync arm interface.

member.name: P:Ivi.LxiSync.IIviLxiSyncArm.Sources
member.summary: Reference to the ILxiSyncArmSources interface.

member.name: P:Ivi.LxiSync.IIviLxiSyncArm.ArmCount
member.summary: Specifies the number of times the arm has to occur to complete the arm loop; that is, the number of arms that are accepted before the measurement must be initiated again.

member.name: P:Ivi.LxiSync.IIviLxiSyncArm.Delay
member.summary: Specifies the delay from when the arm logic satisfied until the waiting for trigger state is entered.

member.name: P:Ivi.LxiSync.IIviLxiSyncArm.Alarms
member.summary: Reference to the ILxiSyncArmAlarms interface.

member.name: T:Ivi.LxiSync.IIviLxiSyncArmAlarm
member.summary: LxiSync arm alarm interface.

member.name: M:Ivi.LxiSync.IIviLxiSyncArmAlarm.Configure(System.Boolean,Ivi.Driver.PrecisionDateTime,Ivi.Driver.PrecisionTimeSpan,System.Int32)
member.summary: Configures the most commonly configured properties of the arm alarm sub-system.
member.param: If true, the arm alarm is enabled. Refer to the Enabled property.
Specifies the 1588 time.
The period of the arm alarm. Refer to the Period property for details.
The number of times to repeat the trigger. Refer to the RepeatCount property for details.

member.name: P:Ivi.LxiSync.IIviLxiSyncArmAlarm.Time
member.summary: The 1588 time at which the alarm will go off.

member.name: P:Ivi.LxiSync.IIviLxiSyncArmAlarm.Period
member.summary: The period of the arm alarm; that is, the amount of time that transpires before the alarm repeats.

member.name: P:Ivi.LxiSync.IIviLxiSyncArmAlarm.RepeatCount
member.summary: The number of times to repeat the trigger at the period specified by the Period property.

member.name: P:Ivi.LxiSync.IIviLxiSyncArmAlarm.Enabled
member.summary: If true, the arm alarm is enabled.

member.name: T:Ivi.LxiSync.IIviLxiSyncArmAlarmCollection
member.summary: LxiSync repeated capability interface containing methods and properties that apply to all arm alarms defined for the device. A particular arm alarm can be accessed using the Item property.

member.name: M:Ivi.LxiSync.IIviLxiSyncArmAlarmCollection.DisableAll
member.summary: Disables all arm alarms.

member.name: M:Ivi.LxiSync.IIviLxiSyncArmAlarmCollection.Add(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new arm alarm
member.param: The name of the arm alarm to create. [Refer to the instrument driver documentation for valid values, which may include one or more of the standard values defined in Ivi.Driver.TriggerSource.]
member.returns: A reference to the new arm alarm object.

member.name: M:Ivi.LxiSync.IIviLxiSyncArmAlarmCollection.Remove(System.String)
member.summary: Removes an arm alarm.
member.param: Specifies the name of the arm alarm to remove.

member.name: M:Ivi.LxiSync.IIviLxiSyncArmAlarmCollection.RemoveAllCustomArmAlarms
member.summary: Removes all of the custom arm alarms that were added using the Add method.

member.name: T:Ivi.LxiSync.IIviLxiSyncArmSource
member.summary: LxiSync arm source interface.

member.name: M:Ivi.LxiSync.IIviLxiSyncArmSource.Configure(System.Boolean,Ivi.LxiSync.ArmSourceDetection)
member.summary: Configures the most commonly configured properties of the arm source sub-system.
member.param: Enables or disables the arm source. Refer to the Enabled property.
The style of arm source detection. Refer to the Detection property.

member.name: P:Ivi.LxiSync.IIviLxiSyncArmSource.Enabled
member.summary: If true, the arm source is enabled.

member.name: P:Ivi.LxiSync.IIviLxiSyncArmSource.Detection
member.summary: The style of arm source detection.

member.name: P:Ivi.LxiSync.IIviLxiSyncArmSource.Filter
member.summary: A filter for restricting arm sources.

member.name: P:Ivi.LxiSync.IIviLxiSyncArmSource.EventId
member.summary: The LAN event identifier that is associated with this arm source. LAN Events with this identifier are accepted from the source described in the filter.

member.name: T:Ivi.LxiSync.IIviLxiSyncArmSourceCollection
member.summary: LxiSync repeated capability interface containing methods and properties that apply to all arm sources defined for the device. A particular arm source can be accessed using the Item property.

member.name: M:Ivi.LxiSync.IIviLxiSyncArmSourceCollection.Add(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new arm source.
member.param: The name of the arm source to create. [Refer to the instrument driver documentation for valid values, which may include one or more of the standard values defined in Ivi.Driver.TriggerSource.]
member.returns: A reference to the new arm source object.

member.name: M:Ivi.LxiSync.IIviLxiSyncArmSourceCollection.Remove(System.String)
member.summary: Removes an arm source.
member.param: The name of the arm source to remove.

member.name: M:Ivi.LxiSync.IIviLxiSyncArmSourceCollection.DisableAll
member.summary: Disables all arm sources.

member.name: M:Ivi.LxiSync.IIviLxiSyncArmSourceCollection.RemoveAllCustomArmSources
member.summary: Removes all of the custom arm sources that were added using the Add method.

member.name: P:Ivi.LxiSync.IIviLxiSyncArmSourceCollection.OrEnabled
member.summary: If true, OR-summing of the arm sources is enabled.

member.name: T:Ivi.LxiSync.IIviLxiSyncEvent
member.summary: LxiSync event interface.

member.name: M:Ivi.LxiSync.IIviLxiSyncEvent.Configure(Ivi.LxiSync.EventDriveMode,System.String,System.String,Ivi.LxiSync.Slope)
member.summary: Configures the most commonly configured properties of the event sub-system.
member.param: The event mode. Refer to the DriveMode property for details.
The signal which causes an event to be transmitted. Refer to the Source property.
The list of places to send the event. Refer to the DestinationPath property.
The slope of the event signal. Refer to the Slope property for details.

member.name: P:Ivi.LxiSync.IIviLxiSyncEvent.Source
member.summary: The signal which causes an event to be transmitted.

member.name: P:Ivi.LxiSync.IIviLxiSyncEvent.DestinationPath
member.summary: The list of places to send the event.

member.name: P:Ivi.LxiSync.IIviLxiSyncEvent.Slope
member.summary: The slope of the inbound event that will cause the generation of an outbound event.

member.name: P:Ivi.LxiSync.IIviLxiSyncEvent.DriveMode
member.summary: The event mode - that is, how the event is transmitted.

member.name: T:Ivi.LxiSync.IIviLxiSyncEventLog
member.summary: LxiSync event log interface.

member.name: M:Ivi.LxiSync.IIviLxiSyncEventLog.Clear
member.summary: Removes all existing entries from the event log.

member.name: M:Ivi.LxiSync.IIviLxiSyncEventLog.GetNextEntry
member.summary: Retrieves and clears the oldest event log entry for the IVI session.

member.name: P:Ivi.LxiSync.IIviLxiSyncEventLog.EntryCount
member.summary: Returns the number of event log entries available.

member.name: P:Ivi.LxiSync.IIviLxiSyncEventLog.Enabled
member.summary: if true, the event logging feature is enabled.

member.name: T:Ivi.LxiSync.IIviLxiSyncEventCollection
member.summary: LxiSync repeated capability interface containing methods and properties that apply to all events defined for the device. A particular event can be accessed using the Item property.

member.name: M:Ivi.LxiSync.IIviLxiSyncEventCollection.DisableAll
member.summary: Disables all events.

member.name: M:Ivi.LxiSync.IIviLxiSyncEventCollection.Add(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new event.
member.param: The name of the event to create.
member.returns: A reference to the new event object.

member.name: M:Ivi.LxiSync.IIviLxiSyncEventCollection.Remove(System.String)
member.summary: Removes an event.
member.param: The name of the event to remove.

member.name: M:Ivi.LxiSync.IIviLxiSyncEventCollection.RemoveAllCustomEvents
member.summary: Removes all of the custom events that were added using the Add function.

member.name: P:Ivi.LxiSync.IIviLxiSyncEventCollection.WiredOrBiasMode
member.summary: The Wired-Or Bias Mode interface lines for which the LXI device will serve as the wired-OR bias.

member.name: T:Ivi.LxiSync.IIviLxiSyncTime
member.summary: LxiSync time interface.

member.name: P:Ivi.LxiSync.IIviLxiSyncTime.SystemTime
member.summary: The current 1588 time.

member.name: P:Ivi.LxiSync.IIviLxiSyncTime.IsMaster
member.summary: Indicates if this device is the 1588 master.

member.name: P:Ivi.LxiSync.IIviLxiSyncTime.IsSynchronized
member.summary: Indicates if the device is synchronized.

member.name: T:Ivi.LxiSync.IIviLxiSyncTrigger
member.summary: LxiSync trigger interface.

member.name: P:Ivi.LxiSync.IIviLxiSyncTrigger.Sources
member.summary: Reference to the ILxiSyncTriggerSources interface.

member.name: P:Ivi.LxiSync.IIviLxiSyncTrigger.TriggerCount
member.summary: Specifies the number of times a trigger has to occur to complete a measurement; that is, the number of triggers that are accepted before the measurement must be armed again.

member.name: P:Ivi.LxiSync.IIviLxiSyncTrigger.Alarms
member.summary: Reference to the ILxiSyncTriggerAlarms interface.

member.name: P:Ivi.LxiSync.IIviLxiSyncTrigger.TriggerSource
member.summary: Specifies which of the available trigger sources to use as the signal for triggering the device-specific operation (for example, a measurement). [Refer to the instrument driver documentation for valid values, which may include one or more of the standard values defined in Ivi.Driver.TriggerSource.]

member.name: T:Ivi.LxiSync.IIviLxiSyncTriggerAlarm
member.summary: LxiSync trigger alarm interface.

member.name: M:Ivi.LxiSync.IIviLxiSyncTriggerAlarm.Configure(Ivi.Driver.PrecisionDateTime,Ivi.Driver.PrecisionTimeSpan,System.Int32)
member.summary: Configures the most commonly configured properties of the trigger alarm sub-system.
member.param: The 1588 time of the trigger alarm. Refer to the Time parameter for details.
The period of the trigger alarm. Refer to the Period parameter for details.
The number of times to repeat the trigger at the period specified by the period parameter. Refer to the RepeatCount property.

member.name: P:Ivi.LxiSync.IIviLxiSyncTriggerAlarm.Period
member.summary: The period of the trigger alarm; that is, the amount of time that transpires before the alarm repeats.

member.name: P:Ivi.LxiSync.IIviLxiSyncTriggerAlarm.RepeatCount
member.summary: The number of times to repeat the trigger at the period specified by the Period property.

member.name: P:Ivi.LxiSync.IIviLxiSyncTriggerAlarm.Time
member.summary: The time at which the alarm will go off.

member.name: P:Ivi.LxiSync.IIviLxiSyncTriggerAlarm.Enabled
member.summary: If true, the trigger alarm is enabled.

member.name: T:Ivi.LxiSync.IIviLxiSyncTriggerAlarmCollection
member.summary: LxiSync repeated capability interface containing methods and properties that apply to all trigger alarms defined for the device. A particular trigger alarm can be accessed using the Item property.

member.name: M:Ivi.LxiSync.IIviLxiSyncTriggerAlarmCollection.Add(System.String)
member.summary: This function creates a new trigger alarm
member.param: Specifies the name of the trigger alarm to create. [Refer to the instrument driver documentation for valid values, which may include one or more of the standard values defined in Ivi.Driver.TriggerSource.]
member.returns: A reference to the new trigger alarm object.

member.name: M:Ivi.LxiSync.IIviLxiSyncTriggerAlarmCollection.DisableAll
member.summary: This function disables all trigger alarms.

member.name: M:Ivi.LxiSync.IIviLxiSyncTriggerAlarmCollection.Remove(System.String)
member.summary: This function removes a trigger alarm.
member.param: Specifies the name of the trigger alarm to remove.

member.name: M:Ivi.LxiSync.IIviLxiSyncTriggerAlarmCollection.RemoveAllTriggerAlarms
member.summary: This function removes all of the trigger alarms that were added using the Add Trigger Alarm function.

member.name: T:Ivi.LxiSync.IIviLxiSyncTriggerSource
member.summary: LxiSync trigger source interface.

member.name: M:Ivi.LxiSync.IIviLxiSyncTriggerSource.Configure(Ivi.Driver.PrecisionTimeSpan,Ivi.LxiSync.Slope)
member.summary: Configures the most commonly configured properties of the trigger source sub-system.
member.param: The trigger source delay. Refer to the Delay property for details.
The slope of the trigger source. Refer to the Detection property.

member.name: P:Ivi.LxiSync.IIviLxiSyncTriggerSource.Delay
member.summary: The trigger source delay from when the trigger logic is satisfied until the device specific action (for instance a measurement) is triggered. A negative value implies pre-trigger acquisition.

member.name: P:Ivi.LxiSync.IIviLxiSyncTriggerSource.Detection
member.summary: The slope of the trigger source.

member.name: P:Ivi.LxiSync.IIviLxiSyncTriggerSource.EventId
member.summary: The LAN event identifier that is associated with this trigger source.

member.name: P:Ivi.LxiSync.IIviLxiSyncTriggerSource.Filter
member.summary: The filter for restricting trigger sources.

member.name: T:Ivi.LxiSync.IIviLxiSyncTriggerSourceCollection
member.summary: LxiSync repeated capability interface containing methods and properties that apply to all trigger sources defined for the device. A particular trigger source can be accessed using the Item property.

member.name: M:Ivi.LxiSync.IIviLxiSyncTriggerSourceCollection.Add(System.String)
member.summary: This function creates a new trigger source.
member.param: Specifies the name of the trigger source to create. [Refer to the instrument driver documentation for valid values, which may include one or more of the standard values defined in Ivi.Driver.TriggerSource.]
member.returns: A reference to the new trigger source object.

member.name: M:Ivi.LxiSync.IIviLxiSyncTriggerSourceCollection.Remove(System.String)
member.summary: This function removes a trigger source.
member.param: Specifies the name of the trigger source to remove.

member.name: M:Ivi.LxiSync.IIviLxiSyncTriggerSourceCollection.RemoveAllCustomTriggerSources
member.summary: This function removes all of the custom trigger sources that were added using the Add Trigger Source function.
